text:
Beebe Freitas (August 28, 1938 - February 17, 2018) was an American pianist, organist, vocal coach and educator. She was the Head of Music for Hawaii Opera Theatre. She was born in Youngstown, Ohio.
Freitas died at her home in Aina Haina, Hawaii on February 17, 2018 of congestive heart failure at the age of 79.
